thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Tiffany Schroeder
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Tiffany Schroeder

author: Tiffany Schroeder
title: Tiffany Schroeder
text: The Luxy team is so helpful, kind and prompt in their communication. Take them up on their offer to help you find the right color for yourself. That's what I did and the color was exactly what I was looking for. They also arrived promptly and have been worth every penny! I love them and look forward to my next set - maybe I'll try the ombr√© :)
